label: uncl5463
comment: Code qualifying an allowance or charge.

values.label: Allowance
values.comment: Code specifying an allowance.

values.label: Total other
values.comment: The total for items other than those primarily reported upon in the message.

values.label: Charge
values.comment: Code specifying a charge.

values.label: Allowance per call off
values.comment: Code specifying a call off allowance.

values.label: Charge per call off
values.comment: Code specifying a charge per call off.

values.label: Allowance message
values.comment: Allowance is related to the entire message.

values.label: Allowance line items
values.comment: Allowance is related to all line items in a message as a default allowance. It may be overridden per line item.

values.label: Line item allowance
values.comment: Allowance is related to a line item. It can override a default allowance.

values.label: Adjustment
values.comment: Code specifying that the allowance or charge is due to an adjustment.

values.label: Charge message
values.comment: Charge is related to the entire message.

values.label: Charge line items
values.comment: Charge is related to all line items in a message as a default charge. It may be overridden per line item.

values.label: Line item charge
values.comment: Charge is related to a line item. It can override a default charge.

values.label: No allowance or charge
values.comment: No increases or reduction in price (list or stated) are included.

values.label: About
values.comment: To be construed as allowing a difference not exceeding 10 % more or 10 % less than the amount which it refers.

values.label: Minus (percentage)
values.comment: The lesser value expressed in percentage.

values.label: Minus (amount)
values.comment: The lesser value expressed in amount.

values.label: Plus (percentage)
values.comment: The greater value expressed in percentage.

values.label: Plus (amount)
values.comment: The greater value expressed in amount.

values.label: Plus/minus (percentage)
values.comment: The greater/lesser value expressed in percentage.

values.label: Plus/minus (amount)
values.comment: The greater/lesser value expressed in amount.

values.label: No allowance
values.comment: Code specifying that there is no allowance.

values.label: No charge
values.comment: Code specifying that there is no charge.

values.label: Maximum
values.comment: Highest possible value; maximum; not exceeding; up to.

values.label: Exact
values.comment: Indicates that this is the exact amount.
